solutions.name: Remote Consultation
solutions.summary: Remote Consultation is a solution integrated into the iPLATO platform and myGP® app that helps GP practices avoid unnecessary appointments and supports remote consultation via chat, video and voice. It allows practices to communicate with patients via video, audio and asynchronous messaging.

covid19.title: How this Catalogue Solution can help with coronavirus
list: provides automated, clinically safe sign-posting to alternative pathways
provides local and national services to suitable patients

solutions.name: GP&Me
solutions.summary: GP&Me is a simple, straight forward, secure video consultation app and application. Despite the name, it can in fact be used in any health or care setting, by any primary care clinician or professional.

covid19.title: How this Catalogue Solution can help with coronavirus
list: provides live video consultation facilities for NHS patients and clinicians
allows patients to arrange and attend secure, remote video consultations with GPs, nurses and pharmacists - or professionals in other health and care settings

solutions.name: alldayDr
solutions.summary: alldayDr allows patients to see a GP using a secure video-consultation via either a web browser or mobile app. The outcome of the consultation is then fed back.

covid19.title: How this Catalogue Solution can help with coronavirus
list: reduces the spread of infection at GP surgeries
allows GPs to respond securely and remotely to patient queries
reduces the number of missed appointments

solutions.name: AccuRx
solutions.summary: AccuRx is a communication platform built around patients and healthcare professionals. Whether you’re a doctor, nurse, or administrator, you can video call or message patients and other healthcare professionals simply and quickly. AccuRx also allows you to send patient questionnaires and documents.

covid19.title: How this Catalogue Solution can help with coronavirus
list: reduces the spread of infection at GP surgeries
allows GPs to respond securely and remotely to patient queries
reduces the number of missed appointments
